channel.title: CVE Feed for Hewlett Packard Enterprise -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Hewlett Packard Enterprise -- all products

item.title: CVE-2018-7067|2024-08-05T06:17:17.496Z -- hewlett%20packard%20enterprise -- aruba%20clearpass%20policy%20manager
item.description: A Remote Authentication bypass in Aruba ClearPass Policy Manager leads to complete cluster compromise. An authentication flaw in all versions of ClearPass could allow an attacker to compromise the entire cluster through a specially crafted API call. Network access to the administrative web interface is required to exploit this vulnerability. Resolution: Fixed in 6.7.6 and 6.6.10-hotfix.

item.title: CVE-2018-7092|2024-08-05T06:17:17.390Z -- hewlett%20packard%20enterprise -- hpe%20intelligent%20management%20center%20platform%20%28imc%20plat%29
item.description: A potential security vulnerability has been identified in HPE Intelligent Management Center Platform (IMC Plat) 7.3 E0506P09. The vulnerability could be remotely exploited to allow for remote directory traversal leading to arbitrary file deletion.

item.title: CVE-2018-7115|2024-08-05T06:17:17.525Z -- hewlett%20packard%20enterprise -- hpe%20intelligent%20management%20center%20%28imc%29
item.description: HPE Intelligent Management Center (IMC) prior to IMC PLAT 7.3 (E0605P06) is vulnerable to a remote buffer overflow in dbman.exe opcode 10001 on Windows. This problem is resolved in IMC PLAT 7.3 (E0605P06) or subsequent versions.

item.title: CVE-2018-7105|2024-08-05T06:17:17.562Z -- hewlett%20packard%20enterprise -- hpe%20integrated%20lights-out%205%20%28ilo%205%29%20for%20hpe%20gen10%20servers%2C%20hpe%20integrated%20lights-out%204%20%28ilo%204%29%2C%20hpe%20integrated%20lights-out%203%20%28ilo%203%29
item.description: A security vulnerability in HPE Integrated Lights-Out 5 (iLO 5) for HPE Gen10 Servers prior to v1.35, HPE Integrated Lights-Out 4 (iLO 4) prior to v2.61, HPE Integrated Lights-Out 3 (iLO 3) prior to v1.90 could be remotely exploited to execute arbitrary code leading to disclosure of information.

item.title: CVE-2018-7071|2024-08-05T06:17:17.411Z -- hewlett%20packard%20enterprise -- hpe%20network%20function%20virtualization%20director%20%28nfvd%29
item.description: HPE has identified a remote access to sensitive information vulnerability in HPE Network Function Virtualization Director (NFVD) 4.2.1 prior to gui patch 3.

item.title: CVE-2018-7098|2024-08-05T06:17:17.466Z -- hewlett%20packard%20enterprise -- hpe%203par%20service%20processors
item.description: A security vulnerability was identified in 3PAR Service Processor (SP) prior to SP-4.4.0.GA-110(MU7). The vulnerability may be locally exploited to allow directory traversal.

item.title: CVE-2018-7079|2024-08-05T06:17:17.393Z -- hewlett%20packard%20enterprise -- aruba%20clearpass%20policy%20manager
item.description: Aruba ClearPass Policy Manager guest authorization failure. Certain administrative operations in ClearPass Guest do not properly enforce authorization rules, which allows any authenticated administrative user to execute those operations regardless of privilege level. This could allow low-privilege users to view, modify, or delete guest users. Resolution: Fixed in 6.7.6 and 6.6.10-hotfix.

item.title: CVE-2018-7108|2024-08-05T06:17:17.462Z -- hewlett%20packard%20enterprise -- hpe%20storageworks%20xp7%20automation%20director%20%28autodir%29
item.description: HPE StorageWorks XP7 Automation Director (AutoDir) version 8.5.2-02 to earlier than 8.6.1-00 has a local and remote authentication bypass vulnerability that exposed the user authentication information of the storage system. This problem sometimes occurred under specific conditions when running a service template.

item.title: CVE-2018-7113|2024-08-05T06:17:17.569Z -- hewlett%20packard%20enterprise -- hpe%20integrated%20lights-out%205%20%28ilo%205%29%20for%20hpe%20gen10%20servers
item.description: A security vulnerability in HPE Integrated Lights-Out 5 (iLO 5) prior to v1.37 could be locally exploited to bypass the security restrictions for firmware updates.

item.title: CVE-2018-7095|2024-08-05T06:17:17.457Z -- hewlett%20packard%20enterprise -- hpe%203par%20service%20processors
item.description: A security vulnerability was identified in 3PAR Service Processor (SP) prior to SP-4.4.0.GA-110(MU7). The vulnerability may be exploited remotely to allow access restriction bypass.

item.title: CVE-2018-7072|2024-08-05T06:17:17.469Z -- hewlett%20packard%20enterprise -- hpe%20moonshot%20provisioning%20manager
item.description: A remote bypass of security restrictions vulnerability was identified in HPE Moonshot Provisioning Manager prior to v1.24.

item.title: CVE-2018-7093|2024-08-05T06:17:17.590Z -- hewlett%20packard%20enterprise -- ilo%205%20for%20hpe%20gen10%20servers%2C%20ilo%204%2C%20ilo%203%2C%20moonshot%20chassis%20management%20firmware%2C%20moonshot%20component%20packs%20for%20hpe%20proliant%20m510%20and%20m710x%20server%20cartridges
item.description: A security vulnerability in HPE Integrated Lights-Out 3 prior to v1.90, iLO 4 prior to v2.60, iLO 5 prior to v1.30, Moonshot Chassis Manager firmware prior to v1.58, and Moonshot Component Pack prior to v2.55 could be remotely exploited to create a denial of service.

item.title: CVE-2018-7070|2024-08-05T06:17:17.381Z -- hewlett%20packard%20enterprise -- hpe%20centralview%20fraud%20risk%20management
item.description: HPE has identified a remote disclosure of information vulnerability in HPE CentralView Fraud Risk Management earlier than version CV 6.1. This issue is resolved in HF16 for HPE CV 6.1 or subsequent version.

item.title: CVE-2018-7078|2024-08-05T06:17:17.478Z -- hewlett%20packard%20enterprise -- hpe%20integrated%20lights-out%204%20%28ilo%204%29%2C%20hpe%20integrated%20lights-out%205%20%28ilo%205%29
item.description: A remote code execution was identified in HPE Integrated Lights-Out 4 (iLO 4) earlier than version v2.60 and HPE Integrated Lights-Out 5 (iLO 5) earlier than version v1.30.

item.title: CVE-2018-7101|2024-08-05T06:17:17.501Z -- hewlett%20packard%20enterprise -- hpe%20integrated%20lights-out%205%20%28ilo%205%29%20for%20hpe%20gen10%20servers%2C%20hpe%20integrated%20lights-out%204%20%28ilo%204%29
item.description: A potential remote denial of service security vulnerability has been identified in HPE Integrated Lights Out 4 prior to v2.60 and iLO 5 for Gen 10 servers prior to v1.30.

item.title: CVE-2018-7060|2024-08-05T06:17:17.380Z -- hewlett%20packard%20enterprise -- aruba%20clearpass
item.description: Aruba ClearPass 6.6.x prior to 6.6.9 and 6.7.x prior to 6.7.1 is vulnerable to CSRF attacks against authenticated users. An attacker could manipulate an authenticated user into performing actions on the web administrative interface.

item.title: CVE-2018-7099|2024-08-05T06:17:17.461Z -- hewlett%20packard%20enterprise -- hpe%203par%20service%20processors
item.description: A security vulnerability was identified in 3PAR Service Processor (SP) prior to SP-4.4.0.GA-110(MU7). The vulnerability may be locally exploited to allow disclosure of privileged information.

item.title: CVE-2018-7063|2024-08-05T06:17:17.407Z -- hewlett%20packard%20enterprise -- aruba%20clearpass%20policy%20manager
item.description: In Aruba ClearPass, disabled API admins can still perform read/write operations. In certain circumstances, API admins in ClearPass which have been disabled may still be able to perform read/write operations on parts of the XML API. This can lead to unauthorized access to the API and complete compromise of the ClearPass instance if an attacker knows of the existence of these accounts.

item.title: CVE-2018-7075|2024-08-05T06:17:17.462Z -- hewlett%20packard%20enterprise -- hpe%20intelligent%20management%20center%20%28imc%29
item.description: A remote cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability was identified in HPE Intelligent Management Center (iMC) PLAT version v7.3 (E0506). The vulnerability is fixed in Intelligent Management Center PLAT 7.3 E0605P04 or subsequent version.

item.title: CVE-2018-7111|2024-08-05T06:17:17.511Z -- hewlett%20packard%20enterprise -- hpe%20uiot
item.description: A remote unauthorized access vulnerability was identified in HPE UIoT versions 1.5, 1.4.0, 1.4.1, 1.4.2, 1.2.4.2. Specifically, there is a malfunction identified in some section of the DSM portal and some DSM APIs. The impact of the malfunction is that the info can be changed by other users.

item.title: CVE-2018-7104|2024-08-05T06:17:17.411Z -- hewlett%20packard%20enterprise -- hpe%20intelligent%20management%20center%20%28imc%29%20wireless%20services%20manager%20software
item.description: A Remote Code Execution vulnerability was identified in HPE Intelligent Management Center (iMC) Wireless Services Manager Software earlier than version IMC WSM 7.3 E0506P02.

item.title: CVE-2018-7110|2024-08-05T06:17:17.513Z -- hewlett%20packard%20enterprise -- hpe%20service%20governance%20framework%20%28sgf%29
item.description: A remote unauthorized disclosure of information vulnerability was identified in HPE Service Governance Framework (SGF) version 4.2, 4.3. A race condition under high load in SGF exists where SGF transferred different parameter to the enabler.

item.title: CVE-2018-7109|2024-08-05T06:17:17.409Z -- hewlett%20packard%20enterprise -- hpe%20enhanced%20internet%20usage%20manager%20%28eium%29
item.description: HPE has addressed a remote arbitrary file modification vulnerability in HPE enhanced Internet Usage Manager (eIUM) v9.0FP1 with the cumulative patch for v9.0FP1 - eIUM90FP01XXX.YYYYMMDD-HHMM.

item.title: CVE-2018-7073|2024-08-05T06:17:17.440Z -- hewlett%20packard%20enterprise -- hpe%20moonshot%20provisioning%20manager
item.description: A local arbitrary file modification vulnerability was identified in HPE Moonshot Provisioning Manager prior to v1.24.

item.title: CVE-2018-7097|2024-08-05T06:17:17.379Z -- hewlett%20packard%20enterprise -- hpe%203par%20service%20processors
item.description: A security vulnerability was identified in 3PAR Service Processor (SP) prior to SP-4.4.0.GA-110(MU7). The vulnerability may be exploited remotely to allow cross-site request forgery.

item.title: CVE-2018-7096|2024-08-05T06:17:17.425Z -- hewlett%20packard%20enterprise -- hpe%203par%20service%20processors
item.description: A security vulnerability was identified in 3PAR Service Processor (SP) prior to SP-4.4.0.GA-110(MU7). The vulnerability may be exploited remotely to allow code execution.

item.title: CVE-2018-7107|2024-08-05T06:17:17.459Z -- hewlett%20packard%20enterprise -- hpe%20device%20entitlement%20gateway%20%28deg%29
item.description: A potential security vulnerability has been identified in HPE Device Entitlement Gateway (DEG) v3.2.4, v3.3 and v3.3.1. The vulnerability could be remotely exploited to allow local SQL injection and elevation of privilege.

item.title: CVE-2018-7116|2024-08-05T06:17:17.600Z -- hewlett%20packard%20enterprise -- hpe%20intelligent%20management%20center%20%28imc%29
item.description: HPE Intelligent Management Center (IMC) prior to IMC PLAT 7.3 (E0605P06) is vulnerable to a remote denial of service via dbman Opcode 10003 'Filename'. This problem is resolved in IMC PLAT 7.3 (E0605P06) or subsequent versions.

item.title: CVE-2018-7077|2024-08-05T06:17:17.400Z -- hewlett%20packard%20enterprise -- hpe%20xp%20p9000%20command%20view%20advanced%20edition%20%28cvae%29
item.description: A security vulnerability in HPE XP P9000 Command View Advanced Edition (CVAE) Device Manager (DevMgr 8.5.0-00 and prior to 8.6.0-00), Configuration Manager (CM 8.5.0-00 and prior to 8.6.0-00) could be exploited to allow local and remote unauthorized access to sensitive information.

item.title: CVE-2018-7068|2024-08-05T06:17:17.456Z -- hewlett%20packard%20enterprise -- hpe%20centralview%20fraud%20risk%20management
item.description: HPE has identified a remote HOST header attack vulnerability in HPE CentralView Fraud Risk Management earlier than version CV 6.1. This issue is resolved in HF16 for HPE CV 6.1 or subsequent version.

item.title: CVE-2018-7066|2024-08-05T06:17:17.529Z -- hewlett%20packard%20enterprise -- aruba%20clearpass%20policy%20manager
item.description: An unauthenticated remote command execution exists in Aruba ClearPass Policy Manager on linked devices. The ClearPass OnConnect feature permits administrators to link other network devices into ClearPass for the purpose of collecting enhanced information about connected endpoints. A defect in the API could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary commands on one of the linked devices. This vulnerability is only applicable if credentials for devices have been supplied to ClearPass under Configuration -> Network -> Devices -> CLI Settings. Resolution: Fixed in 6.7.5 and 6.6.10-hotfix.

item.title: CVE-2018-7114|2024-08-05T06:17:17.502Z -- hewlett%20packard%20enterprise -- hpe%20intelligent%20management%20center%20%28imc%29
item.description: HPE Intelligent Management Center (IMC) prior to IMC PLAT 7.3 (E0605P06) is vulnerable to remote buffer overflow in dbman leading to code execution. This problem is resolved in IMC PLAT 7.3 (E0605P06) or subsequent versions.

item.title: CVE-2018-7094|2024-08-05T06:17:17.465Z -- hewlett%20packard%20enterprise -- hpe%203par%20service%20processors
item.description: A security vulnerability was identified in 3PAR Service Processor (SP) prior to SP-5.0.0.0-22913(GA). The vulnerability may be exploited locally to allow disclosure of privileged information.

item.title: CVE-2018-7102|2024-08-05T06:17:17.555Z -- hewlett%20packard%20enterprise -- hpe%20intelligent%20management%20center%20%28imc%29%20plat
item.description: A security vulnerability in HPE Intelligent Management Center (iMC) PLAT E0506P09, createFabricAutoCfgFile could be remotely exploited via directory traversal to allow remote arbitrary file modification.

item.title: CVE-2018-7065|2024-08-05T06:17:17.414Z -- hewlett%20packard%20enterprise -- aruba%20clearpass%20policy%20manager
item.description: An authenticated SQL injection vulnerability in Aruba ClearPass Policy Manager can lead to privilege escalation. All versions of ClearPass are affected by multiple authenticated SQL injection vulnerabilities. In each case, an authenticated administrative user of any type could exploit this vulnerability to gain access to "appadmin" credentials, leading to complete cluster compromise. Resolution: Fixed in 6.7.6 and 6.6.10-hotfix.

item.title: CVE-2018-7090|2024-08-05T06:17:17.355Z -- hewlett%20packard%20enterprise -- hpe%20xp%20p9000%20command%20view%20advanced%20edition%20software%20%28cvae%29%20versions%207.0.0-00%20to%20earlier%20than%208.60-00
item.description: HPE XP P9000 Command View Advanced Edition Software (CVAE) has local and remote cross site scripting vulnerability in versions 7.0.0-00 to earlier than 8.60-00 of DevMgr, TSMgr and RepMgr.

item.title: CVE-2018-7103|2024-08-05T06:17:17.419Z -- hewlett%20packard%20enterprise -- hpe%20intelligent%20management%20center%20%28imc%29%20wireless%20services%20manager%20software
item.description: A Remote Code Execution vulnerability was identified in HPE Intelligent Management Center (iMC) Wireless Services Manager Software earlier than version IMC WSM 7.3 E0506P02.

item.title: CVE-2018-7080|2024-08-05T06:17:17.458Z -- hewlett%20packard%20enterprise -- aruba%20access%20points
item.description: A vulnerability exists in the firmware of embedded BLE radios that are part of some Aruba Access points. An attacker who is able to exploit the vulnerability could install new, potentially malicious firmware into the AP's BLE radio and could then gain access to the AP's console port. This vulnerability is applicable only if the BLE radio has been enabled in affected access points. The BLE radio is disabled by default. Note - Aruba products are NOT affected by a similar vulnerability being tracked as CVE-2018-16986.

item.title: CVE-2018-7091|2024-08-05T06:17:17.467Z -- hewlett%20packard%20enterprise -- hpe%20xp%20p9000%20command%20view%20advanced%20edition%20software%20%28cvae%29
item.description: HPE XP P9000 Command View Advanced Edition Software (CVAE) has open URL redirection vulnerability in versions 7.0.0-00 to earlier than 8.60-00 of DevMgr, TSMgr and RepMgr.

item.title: CVE-2018-7058|2024-08-05T06:17:17.489Z -- hewlett%20packard%20enterprise -- aruba%20clearpass
item.description: Aruba ClearPass, all versions of 6.6.x prior to 6.6.9 are affected by an authentication bypass vulnerability, an attacker can leverage this vulnerability to gain administrator privileges on the system. The vulnerability is exposed only on ClearPass web interfaces, including administrative, guest captive portal, and API. Customers who do not expose ClearPass web interfaces to untrusted users are impacted to a lesser extent.

item.title: CVE-2018-7100|2024-08-05T06:17:17.460Z -- hewlett%20packard%20enterprise -- hp%201810-24g%2C%20hp%201810-48g%2C%20hp%201810-8%20v2%20switches
item.description: A potential security vulnerability has been identified in HPE OfficeConnect 1810 Switch Series (HP 1810-24G - P.2.22 and previous versions, HP 1810-48G PK.1.34 and previous versions, HP 1810-8 v2 P.2.22 and previous versions). The vulnerability could allow local disclosure of sensitive information.

item.title: CVE-2018-7074|2024-08-05T06:17:17.415Z -- hewlett%20packard%20enterprise -- hpe%20intelligent%20management%20center%20%28imc%29
item.description: A remote code execution vulnerability was identified in HPE Intelligent Management Center (iMC) PLAT 7.3 E0506P07. The vulnerability was resolved in iMC PLAT 7.3 E0605P04 or subsequent version.

item.title: CVE-2018-7112|2024-08-05T06:17:17.526Z -- hewlett%20packard%20enterprise -- windows%20firmware%20installer%20for%20gen9%2C%20gen8%2C%20g7%2Cand%20g6%20hpe%20servers
item.description: The HPE-provided Windows firmware installer for certain Gen9, Gen8, G7,and G6 HPE servers allows local disclosure of privileged information. This issue was resolved in previously provided firmware updates as follows. The HPE Windows firmware installer was updated in the system ROM updates which also addressed the original Spectre/Meltdown set of vulnerabilities. At that time, the Windows firmware installer was also updated in the versions of HPE Integrated Lights-Out 2, 3, and 4 (iLO 2, 3, and 4) listed in the security bulletin. The updated HPE Windows firmware installer was released in the system ROM and HPE Integrated Lights-Out (iLO) releases documented in earlier HPE Security Bulletins: HPESBHF03805, HPESBHF03835, HPESBHF03831. Windows-based systems that have already been updated to the system ROM or iLO versions described in these security bulletins require no further action.

item.title: CVE-2018-7069|2024-08-05T06:17:17.341Z -- hewlett%20packard%20enterprise -- hpe%20centralview%20fraud%20risk%20management
item.description: HPE has identified a remote unauthenticated access to files vulnerability in HPE CentralView Fraud Risk Management earlier than version CV 6.1. This issue is resolved in HF16 for HPE CV 6.1 or subsequent version.

item.title: CVE-2018-7076|2024-08-05T06:17:17.427Z -- hewlett%20packard%20enterprise -- hpe%20intelligence%20management%20center%20%28imc%29%20plat
item.description: A remote code execution vulnerability was identified in HPE Intelligent Management Center (iMC) prior to iMC PLAT 7.3 E0605P04.

item.title: CVE-2024-41914|2024-08-02T04:46:52.755Z -- hewlett%20packard%20enterprise -- hpe%20aruba%20networking%20edgeconnect%20sd-wan%20orchestrator
item.description: A vulnerability in the web-based management interface of EdgeConnect SD-WAN Orchestrator could allow an authenticated remote attacker to conduct a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) attack against an administrative user of the interface. A successful exploit allows an attacker to execute arbitrary script code in a victim's browser in the context of the affected interface.

item.title: CVE-2024-22437|2024-07-25T15:51:08.406Z -- hewlett%20packard%20enterprise -- hpe%20msa%20san%20storage%20vss%20provider%20and%20capi%20proxy%20software
item.description: A potential security vulnerability has been identified in VSS Provider and CAPI Proxy software for certain HPE MSA storage products. This vulnerability could be exploited to gain elevated privilege on the system.

item.title: CVE-2024-22444|2024-07-24T20:11:41.275Z -- hewlett%20packard%20enterprise -- hpe%20aruba%20networking%20edgeconnect%20sd-wan%20orchestrator
item.description: A vulnerability within the web-based management interface of EdgeConnect SD-WAN Orchestrator could allow a remote attacker to conduct a reflected cross-site scripting (XSS) attack against a user of the interface. A successful exploit could allow an attacker to execute arbitrary script code in a victims browser in the context of the affected interface.

item.title: CVE-2024-22443|2024-07-24T15:08:07.150Z -- hewlett%20packard%20enterprise -- hpe%20aruba%20networking%20edgeconnect%20sd-wan%20orchestrator
item.description: A vulnerability in the web-based management interface of EdgeConnect SD-WAN Orchestrator could allow an authenticated remote attacker to conduct a server-side prototype pollution attack. Successful exploitation of this vulnerability could allow an attacker to execute arbitrary commands on the underlying operating system leading to complete system compromise.

item.title: CVE-2024-22444|2024-07-24T15:17:18.394Z -- hewlett%20packard%20enterprise -- hpe%20aruba%20networking%20edgeconnect%20sd-wan%20orchestrator
item.description: A vulnerability within the web-based management interface of EdgeConnect SD-WAN Orchestrator could allow a remote attacker to conduct a reflected cross-site scripting (XSS) attack against a user of the interface. A successful exploit could allow an attacker to execute arbitrary script code in a victims browser in the context of the affected interface.

item.title: CVE-2024-22438|2024-06-18T14:35:09.119Z -- hewlett%20packard%20enterprise -- hpe%20officeconnect%201820%20network%20switches
item.description: A potential security vulnerability has been identified in Hewlett Packard Enterprise OfficeConnect 1820 Network switches. The vulnerability could be remotely exploited to allow execution of malicious code.

item.title: CVE-2024-22437|2024-04-15T09:21:40.627Z -- hewlett%20packard%20enterprise -- hpe%20msa%20san%20storage%20vss%20provider%20and%20capi%20proxy%20software
item.description: A potential security vulnerability has been identified in VSS Provider and CAPI Proxy software for certain HPE MSA storage products. This vulnerability could be exploited to gain elevated privilege on the system.

item.title: CVE-2024-22440|2024-06-04T17:52:38.714Z -- hewlett%20packard%20enterprise -- hpe%20compute%20scale-up%20server%203200%20server
item.description: A potential security vulnerability has been identified in HPE Compute Scale-up Server 3200 server. This vulnerability could cause disclosure of sensitive information in log files.

item.title: CVE-2024-22438|2024-04-15T09:37:46.770Z -- hewlett%20packard%20enterprise -- hpe%20officeconnect%201820%20network%20switches
item.description: A potential security vulnerability has been identified in Hewlett Packard Enterprise OfficeConnect 1820 Network switches. The vulnerability could be remotely exploited to allow execution of malicious code.

item.title: CVE-2024-22435|2024-04-15T09:06:09.732Z -- hewlett%20packard%20enterprise -- hpe%20nonstop%20web%20viewpoint%20enterprise%20software
item.description: A potential security vulnerability has been identified in Web ViewPoint Enterprise software. This vulnerability could be exploited to allow unauthorized users to access some resources on a NonStop system.

item.title: CVE-2024-22439|2024-06-04T17:52:46.976Z -- hewlett%20packard%20enterprise -- hpe%20flexnetwork%20and%20flexfabric%20products
item.description: A potential security vulnerability has been identified in HPE FlexFabric and FlexNetwork series products. This vulnerability could be exploited to gain privileged access to switches resulting in information disclosure.

item.title: CVE-2024-41914|2024-07-24T14:57:55.556Z -- hewlett%20packard%20enterprise -- hpe%20aruba%20networking%20edgeconnect%20sd-wan%20orchestrator
item.description: A vulnerability in the web-based management interface of EdgeConnect SD-WAN Orchestrator could allow an authenticated remote attacker to conduct a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) attack against an administrative user of the interface. A successful exploit allows an attacker to execute arbitrary script code in a victim's browser in the context of the affected interface.

item.description: A vulnerability in the web-based management interface of EdgeConnect SD-WAN Orchestrator could allow an authenticated remote attacker to conduct a server-side prototype pollution attack. Successful exploitation of this vulnerability could allow an attacker to execute arbitrary commands on the underlying operating system leading to complete system compromise.

item.description: A vulnerability in the web-based management interface of EdgeConnect SD-WAN Orchestrator could allow an authenticated remote attacker to conduct a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) attack against an administrative user of the interface. A successful exploit allows an attacker to execute arbitrary script code in a victim's browser in the context of the affected interface.

item.title: CVE-2024-22435|2024-08-01T22:43:34.953Z -- hewlett%20packard%20enterprise -- hpe%20nonstop%20web%20viewpoint%20enterprise%20software
item.description: A potential security vulnerability has been identified in Web ViewPoint Enterprise software. This vulnerability could be exploited to allow unauthorized users to access some resources on a NonStop system.

item.title: CVE-2024-22437|2024-08-01T22:43:34.946Z -- hewlett%20packard%20enterprise -- hpe%20msa%20san%20storage%20vss%20provider%20and%20capi%20proxy%20software
item.description: A potential security vulnerability has been identified in VSS Provider and CAPI Proxy software for certain HPE MSA storage products. This vulnerability could be exploited to gain elevated privilege on the system.

item.title: CVE-2024-22444|2024-08-01T22:43:34.992Z -- hewlett%20packard%20enterprise -- hpe%20aruba%20networking%20edgeconnect%20sd-wan%20orchestrator
item.description: A vulnerability within the web-based management interface of EdgeConnect SD-WAN Orchestrator could allow a remote attacker to conduct a reflected cross-site scripting (XSS) attack against a user of the interface. A successful exploit could allow an attacker to execute arbitrary script code in a victims browser in the context of the affected interface.

item.title: CVE-2024-22440|2024-08-01T22:43:34.942Z -- hewlett%20packard%20enterprise -- hpe%20compute%20scale-up%20server%203200%20server
item.description: A potential security vulnerability has been identified in HPE Compute Scale-up Server 3200 server. This vulnerability could cause disclosure of sensitive information in log files.

item.title: CVE-2024-22443|2024-08-01T22:43:34.951Z -- hewlett%20packard%20enterprise -- hpe%20aruba%20networking%20edgeconnect%20sd-wan%20orchestrator
item.description: A vulnerability in the web-based management interface of EdgeConnect SD-WAN Orchestrator could allow an authenticated remote attacker to conduct a server-side prototype pollution attack. Successful exploitation of this vulnerability could allow an attacker to execute arbitrary commands on the underlying operating system leading to complete system compromise.

item.title: CVE-2024-22438|2024-08-01T22:43:34.942Z -- hewlett%20packard%20enterprise -- hpe%20officeconnect%201820%20network%20switches
item.description: A potential security vulnerability has been identified in Hewlett Packard Enterprise OfficeConnect 1820 Network switches. The vulnerability could be remotely exploited to allow execution of malicious code.

item.title: CVE-2024-22439|2024-08-01T22:43:34.952Z -- hewlett%20packard%20enterprise -- hpe%20flexnetwork%20and%20flexfabric%20products
item.description: A potential security vulnerability has been identified in HPE FlexFabric and FlexNetwork series products. This vulnerability could be exploited to gain privileged access to switches resulting in information disclosure.
